homebrew-action-addsection:
Used in the Homebrew skin. See for example {{canonicalurl:Talk:Main_Page|useskin=homebrew}}
{{Identical|Add topic}}
homebrew-action-delete:
Used in the Homebrew skin, as the name of a tab at the top of the page. See for example {{canonicalurl:Main_Page|useskin=homebrew}}

{{Identical|Delete}}
homebrew-action-move:
Used in the Homebrew skin, on the tabs at the top of the page. See for example {{canonicalurl:Talk:Main_Page|useskin=homebrew}}

{{Identical|Move}}
homebrew-action-protect:
Tab at top of page, in homebrew skin

{{Identical|Protect}}
homebrew-action-undelete:
Tab at top of page, in homebrew skin.
{{Identical|Undelete}}
homebrew-action-unprotect:
Tab at top of page, in homebrew skin.
{{Identical|Change protection}}
homebrew-view-create:
Tab label in the Homebrew skin. See for example {{canonicalurl:Foo|useskin=homebrew}}
{{Identical|Create}}
homebrew-view-edit:
Tab label in the Homebrew skin. See for example {{canonicalurl:Main_Page|useskin=homebrew}}
{{Identical|Edit}}
homebrew-view-history:
Tab label in the Homebrew skin. See for example {{canonicalurl:Main_Page|useskin=homebrew}}
{{Identical|View history}}
homebrew-view-view:
Tab label in the Homebrew skin (verb). See for example {{canonicalurl:Main_Page|useskin=homebrew}}.
{{Identical|Read}}
homebrew-view-viewsource:
Tab label in the Homebrew skin.
{{Identical|View source}}
homebrew-more-actions: Label in the Homebrew skin's menu for the less-important or rarer actions which are not shown as tabs (like moving the page, or for sysops deleting or protecting the page), as well as (for users with a narrow viewing window in their browser) the less-important tab actions which the user's browser is unable to fit in. {{Identical|More}}
